item.title: 米国、英国、ドイツの出版社35社の従業員と国際的な専門家への170件のインタビューに基づく、報道機関におけるAIの利用に関する報告書（Felix M. Simon/Columbia Journalism Review）
item.description:
Felix M. Simon / Columbia Journalism Review:
A report on the use of AI in news organizations, based on 170 interviews with employees at 35 publishers in the US, UK, and Germany and international experts  —  Executive Summary  —  Despite growing interest, the effects of AI on the news industry and our information environment — the public arena — remain poorly understood.

item.title: デジタル出版が始まってからの30年間、絶えず形を変えながらも「絶滅レベルの出来事」に直面しているニュースメディアの現状を見る（クレア・マローン／ニューヨーカー誌）
item.description:
Clare Malone / New Yorker:
A look at the state of news media, which faces an “extinction-level event” despite constantly reshaping itself in the first three decades of digital publishing  —  Ads are scarce, search and social traffic is dying, and readers are burned out.  The future will require fundamentally rethinking …

item.title: BIPOCが率いる報道機関にとって身近な問題である。
item.description:
Sophie Culpepper / Nieman Lab:
How entrenched patterns of philanthropic funding leave behind small nonprofit newsrooms, an issue with which BIPOC-led outlets are all too familiar  —  “All of these are choices that funders make, and they could choose differently if they wanted to.”

item.title: キルギスの裁判所は、政府に批判的な人気ニュースサイトを運営していたNGO団体Kloopの解散を決定。
item.description:
Reuters:
A court in Kyrgyzstan rules to dissolve Kloop, an NGO that ran a popular news website often critical of the government, following raids on several other outlets  —  A court in Kyrgyzstan has ruled to dissolve a non-governmental organisation that ran a popular news website often critical of the government.

item.title: メッセンジャーの元スタッフによれば、ジミー・フィンケルスタインは日常業務に口出しして彼らを苛立たせたという。
item.description:
Erik Wemple / Washington Post:
Ex-Messenger staffers say Jimmy Finkelstein flustered them by meddling in daily operations, including an obsession that the homepage shouldn't be too anti-Trump  —  Jimmy Finkelstein was chief executive and founder of the Messenger, a much-hyped general news site that recently collapsed, leaving about 250 journalists looking for work.

item.title: 検索結果の要約でカスタムウェブページを作成するArc SearchのBrowse for Me機能、収益化可能なトラフィックを失う懸念で反発に直面（Pranav Dixit/Engadget）
item.description:
Pranav Dixit / Engadget:
Arc Search's Browse for Me feature, which creates custom webpages with search result summaries, faces a backlash over concerns about losing monetizable traffic  —  A new feature from the Arc browser puts search result summaries on a single web page that it creates on its own, cheating websites out of valuable traffic.
